article_heading: Rodrigo Faro's wife returns home after discovering a lump and being hospitalized: 'we continue praying'
description: The image is a collage of three separate photographs, each featuring a different person. The style of the image is candid and appears to be taken in a hospital setting.  In the top photo, there is a woman lying on a hospital bed. She has long, wavy brown hair and is wearing a black top. Her expression is neutral, and she is looking directly at the camera.  The middle photo shows a man standing next to the woman in the hospital bed. He is wearing a black shirt and has short, dark hair. He is smiling and looking directly at the camera.  The bottom photo features another woman, who is also lying on a hospital bed. She has long, straight brown hair and is wearing a black top. Her expression is calm, and she is looking directly at the camera.  All three individuals are wearing hospital gowns, suggesting they are in a medical facility. The background of each photo includes hospital equipment and walls, indicating that the photos were taken within a hospital room.
